name: generate_liquid_chart
description: Generate a liquid chart to visualize a single value as a percentage, such as, the current occupancy rate of a reservoir or the completion percentage of a project.

percent.description: The percentage value to display in the liquid chart, should be a number between 0 and 1, where 1 represents 100%. For example, 0.75 represents 75%.

shape.description: The shape of the liquid chart, can be 'circle', 'rect', 'pin', or 'triangle'. Default is 'circle'.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
